package.name: Mowbot Rover
package.description: This package contains all code required to run Mowbot - a F1Tenth / MIT Racecar style rover robot. The robot uses: ROS, Intel Realsense, Ubuntu, NVidia Jetpack, NVidia Jetson TX1, FOC BOX VESC BLDC Controller, RP Lidar, NVidia Jetson Nano, Sparkfun GPS. The code is written in CPP. The author is Shaun Bowman. Written 2021/08/18.
